snippet: After months of community protest and a legal stalemate, the Brooklyn hospital has begun preparations to close its doors.
abstract: New York State Health Department approves key steps to close Long Island College Hospital, signaling end of line for 155-year-old institution; hospital has been subject of bitter fight between SUNY Downstate Medical Center, which wants to close it, and unions representing hospital workers, who are fighting to keep it open.
lead_paragraph: After months of community protest and a legal stalemate, the Brooklyn hospital has begun preparations to close its doors.

headline.main: First Steps in Shutdown of Long Island College Hospital Are Approved
headline.print_headline: First Steps In Shutdown Of a Hospital Are Approved
